span.span: Circle of Seasons is a one-of-a kind public school that focuses on educating the whole child -
- guided by the Core Principles of Public Waldorf Education. Located on a beautiful campus in Fogelsville, Pa, we serve grades K-8 (2019-2020 school year).
*Transportation is available from most local school districts
A Member of the Alliance for Public Waldorf
